name: Murphy's Dungeon
description:
Those pesky heroes are at it again

Some heroes are trying to steal your Blue Tape of Power. Again. Use your monsters, boulders and unstable ceilings to lure the heroes and prevent them from doing it!

A game made for Siberian Game Jam - November 2021.

Credits:
  • Polumrak - music, sound effects
  • RedTeapot (me) - graphics, code, levels
Stuff used:
  • Godot - the game engine
  • Aseprite - an amazing pixel art editor
  • Symtext - the font
